name: misadjust
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to make a mistake when trying to change or improve something: It is quite easy for the user to misadjust the controls. If you misadjust the throttle, you can start a fire in the exhaust pipe.
More examplesFewer examplesThe machine has no visible controls for the user to misadjust.I misadjusted one of the knobs, which badly affected the performance of the detector.It is easy to misadjust the amount of pressure you need to lift the valve.Every button coincides with an onscreen menu, so it is almost impossible to misadjust your settings.
